CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Hi Neeku, 

 

Hope all is well. 

 

Appreciate sending us the renewal insurance policies and bank endorsements for below entities:

 

•                     ALLIED ENT.

•                     SAJ EMIRATES TRDG (L.L.C) 

•                     SOGEDIMO TRDG. 

 

 

Appreciate if you could send me copies by email, and arrange to deliver the originals at the branch.

 

 

Thank you & Best Regards,

 

Yassemeen Al Mubarak 

 

+9712 6938620

BNP Paribas Abu Dhabi Branch 

Level 12, Etihad Tower(3), 

P.O. Box 2742
